---
title: "Formulas for converting between period, frequency, and angular frequency"
output: pdf_document
---

\huge

$$\begin{aligned}
P&=\text{period}\\
f&=\text{frequency}\\
B&=\text{angular frequency}
\end{aligned}$$

\vspace{50pt}

$$\begin{aligned}
B &= \frac{2\pi}{P} &&{\phantom{xxx}}&&&&& B &= 2\pi f\\\\\\
P &= \frac{2\pi}{B} &&{\phantom{xxx}}&&&&& P &= \frac{1}{f}\\\\\\
f &= \frac{1}{P} &&{\phantom{xxx}}&&&&& f &= \frac{B}{2\pi}
\end{aligned}$$
